articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Message of Sympathy from Mozambican President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Message of Sympathy from Mozambican President 
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a message of sympathy from Mozambican President Armando Emilio Guebuza on August 6.
					 The message said that upon hearing the very surprising news that flood hit several parts of the DPRK recently, causing damage, he expressed profound sympathy to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to the flood victims and their bereaved families in the afflicted areas.
					
					 The message expressed conviction that the heroic Korean people would come back to a normal life as early as possible after overcoming all challenges caused by the bad weather under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Paying the highest respect to Kim Jong Un, the message sincerely wished the people of the DPRK steady progress and prosperity.

articles.title: DPRK Institutions Condemn Ulji Freedom Guardian Exercises Projected in S. Korea
articles.content:
DPRK Institutions Condemn Ulji Freedom Guardian Exercises Projected in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The provocative Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises are to be staged throughout south Korea from August 20. 30 000-strong U.S. imperialist aggressor forces, huge forces of the south Korean puppet army and service personnel of foreign countries including Australia, the U.K., Canada, New Zealand, Denmark, Norway and France will take part in the military drills.
					 Bodies of the DPRK made public a joint statement on August 19 as regards the touch-and-go situation prevailing in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 They are the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea, Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea, National Peace Committee of Korea and the National Reconciliation Council.
					
					 The statement said that the military maneuvers are a serious challenge to the public at home and abroad hoping for the peace and detente on the peninsula, and an unpardonable military provocation to the DPRK. It is also a declaration of an all-out war against it.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime are working hard to attain their goal for aggression at any cost by resorting to the direct use of armed forces and unleashing a war after their unsuccessful sanctions and blockade and failed attempt to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The prevailing situation clearly shows who is the root cause disturbing the peace and security in the peninsula and who is the source and provocateur of a war.
					
					 The DPRK has Kim Jong Il's patriotism and single-minded unity more powerful than nukes.
					
					 Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, great brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu, issued an order to the effect that if the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet regime dare preempt reckless firing, it will not be confined to a local war and the DPRK will never miss the priceless golden opportunity but lead it to a sacred war for national reunification.
					
					 If they wage the reckless war games to invade the DPRK and even a single shell is dropped on its inviolable territory or waters, its revolutionary armed forces will deal a deadly counter-strike at them and wipe out the aggressors from this land through a nationwide holy war to give vent to the wrath and condemnation of all Koreans in the south and the north and achieve the historic victory in the great war for national reunification without fail. The Koreans are undergoing all sorts of sufferings and misfortune due to the national division.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Grave of Kim Po Hyon
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Grave of Kim Po Hyon
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the grave of Kim Po Hyon, grandfather of President Kim Il Sung, in Mangyongdae on Sunday on the occasion of his 141st birth anniversary.
					 Seen before the grave was a wreath sent by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, Kang Sok Ju, Ri Myong Su, Mun Kyong Dok, officials of party and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 A wreath was placed before the grave in the name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Also laid were wreaths in the name of working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, and party and power organs, universities and farms in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence, recollecting the noble life of Kim Po Hyon, an ardent patriot.

articles.title: Torrential Rain Lashes Many Areas of DPRK
articles.content:
Torrential Rain Lashes Many Areas of DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Downpour has hit again Pyongyang and Nampho cities, South Phyongan, North and South Hwanghae, Kangwon and South Hamgyong provinces, in the wake of heavy rains on August 14-15.
					 According to an initial survey, from 12:00 Friday to 06:00 Sunday, 289 mm rainfall was observed in Phyongsan, 241 mm in Sinphyong and 231 mm in Kumchon counties, North Hwanghae Province, 260 mm in Sepho, 246 mm in Popdong and 204 mm in Ichon counties, Kangwon Province and 208 mm in Pongchon County, South Hwanghae Province.
					
					 Samsok District, Pyongyang City and Cholwon County, Kangwon Province experienced 189 mm rainfall and Singye County, North Hwanghae Province 184 mm.
					
					 Nearly 30 areas have been visited by a heavy rain above 100 mm up till now throughout the country.
					
					 It rained 86 mm in Phyongsong City, South Phyongan Province, 68 mm in Ichon County, Kangwon Province and 60 mm in Yodok County, South Hamgyong Province from 03:00 to 06:00 Saturday, while 98 mm in Pongchon and 70 mm in Unryul counties, South Hwanghae Province from 06:00 to 09:00 Saturday and 103 mm in Phyongsan County, North Hwanghae Province from 09:00 to 12:00 Saturday.
					
					 The rainfall is expected to last until August 21.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Removing Root Cause of War
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Removing Root Cause of War
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean warmongers and the U.S. are set to stage large-scale Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises, aimed at invading the DPRK, from August 20.  
					 They are drawing into the saber-rattling even military personnel of different countries which had dispatched troops to the last Korean War under the helmet of the "UN forces".
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a bylined article says in this regard:
					
					 The frantic war drills may become a fuse for a new Korean war. It is crucial to shatter their moves, remove the root cause of war and achieve the durable peace.
					
					 The ceaseless anti-DPRK war maneuvers staged by the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak puppet regime in south Korea are the root cause wrecking peace.
					
					 Ulji Freedom Guardian is a dangerous maneuver to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK.
					
					 There is no legal guarantee for providing peace and security in the Korean Peninsula at present. The Korean Armistice Agreement has already become invalid as the war-like forces at home and abroad threatened peace and security in the peninsula. The danger of war has reached the extremes owing to the vicious moves of the south Korean conservative regime for confrontation with the DPRK and heinous provocations against it.
					
					 What the U.S. seeks is to swallow up the whole of Korea and hold hegemony in Northeast Asia with south Korea as a military base and springboard. Following this aggression-minded foreign forces, the Lee Myung Bak regime is contemplating unleashing the second Korean war.
					
					 If the enemy dares preempt an attack on the DPRK, all its service persons and people will give free rein to the might of Songun they have built to wipe out the provocateurs to the last man and remove the root cause of aggression and war.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces Anti-DPRK Remarks of Lee Myung Bak of S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces Anti-DPRK Remarks of Lee Myung Bak of S. Korea 
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea made an "address in celebration of August 15" on Wednesday.  
					 Far from touching on his unpopular and anti-reunification crimes, he talked about "consistent and principled north policy" as if it proved effective. He ridiculously tried to admonish the DPRK, calling for "facing up to the situation" and "changes". More serious is that he openly revealed his ambition for "unification of social systems" talking nonsense that "unification would be a bigger springboard."
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a bylined commentary brands the "celebration address" by traitor Lee as the last-ditch effort of one in the tightest corner, and a product of the sinister aim to totally destroy the north-south relations and implement the confrontation policy at any cost.
					
					 The commentary says:
					
					 Lee Myung Bak let loose such disgusting words as "door of dialogue" and "preparedness for cooperation", while pleased over the north-south ties that have faced a tragic phase. This is a just a sleight of hand of the confrontation maniac. 
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the traitor disclosed the ambition for "unification of social systems" talking about "change" and "unification". The DPRK will never pardon this. 
					
					 He openly declared to rush headlong into the way of treachery till the last moments of his life by spitting out confrontation remarks in his last "address on August 15" before his term. 
					
					 Lee Myung Bak is, indeed, a heinous traitor with whom the Korean nation can not live in the same land. 
					
					 He can never evade the miserable end as he has persisted in treachery and the north-south confrontation from beginning to the end of his term.

articles.title: Action for Checking Conclusion of Traitorous Agreement with Japan Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Action for Checking Conclusion of Traitorous Agreement with Japan Declared in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Members of more than 30 organizations of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on August 14 denouncing the south Korean regime for its moves to sign a military agreement with Japan. They included the Solidarity for Progress, the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Confederation of Trade Unions.
					 Speakers said at least 80 000 personages across south Korea have participated in the signature campaign opposing the conclusion of a military agreement with Japan from August 1 to 10.
					
					 To sign the military agreement is a treacherous act of paving the way for Japan's comeback to Korea, they charged.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak regime, however, is neither punishing those involved in the move to sign the agreement in secrecy nor giving up the conclusion, they noted.
					
					 It is the mindset of the people that south Korea should not conclude a military agreement with Japan, they said, warning the people will continue watching the regime.
					
					 They will continue their struggle till the regime totally gives up the bid for the agreement, they declared.
					
					 At the end of the press conference, representatives handed over the signature papers to Chongwadae.

articles.title: Flagship of 7th Fleet of U.S. Navy Enters Pusan Port
articles.content:
Flagship of 7th Fleet of U.S. Navy Enters Pusan Port 
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Blue Ridge, flagship of the 7th Fleet of the U.S. Navy, entered Pusan Port, south Korea on Friday to take part in the joint military drills Ulji Freedom Guardian, the south Korean Yonhap News reported. 
					 This ship took part in Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills in March this year, inciting war hysteria against the DPRK.
					
					 The entry of this ship the main duty of which is overseas aggression reveals the aggressive nature of the joint military drills.

articles.title: S. Korean Sentenced to Prison Term
articles.content:
S. Korean Sentenced to Prison Term 
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Chongju District Court on August 17 sentenced an inhabitant who praised the DPRK to a prison term on charges of the violation of the "Security Law", the south Korean Yonhap News reported.
					 The fascist authorities arrested and brought a complaint against him in May last year for the mere reason that he posted on Internet homepage articles praising the nuclear tests of the DPRK and exposing the conspiratorial nature of the "Cheonan" warship sinking case from July 2009 to March last year.
					
					 At several trials he justified his activities, shouting "Long live the great DPRK!" Enraged at this, the court inflicted penal servitude on him, claiming that he "praised the north, the anti-state organization," and "insulted the court at trials".

articles.title: S. Korean Workers Launch General Strikes
articles.content:
S. Korean Workers Launch General Strikes
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The Metal Trade Union under the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions launched the fourth general strike for winning the vital rights on August 17, south Korean KBS reported.
					 At least 100 000 unionists of major enterprises including the Hyundai and the Kia motor plants staged strikes in demand of the abolition of part-time job and improvement of working conditions.
					
					 They warned they will stage the fifth general strike on August 29 if the company sides continue suppression, not resuming dealings with trade unions.
					
					 Meanwhile, more than 3 500 unionists of the Kumho Tyre Plant started a total strike in demand of wage hike on August 16.

articles.title: KCTU Stages Sit-in Strike in S. Korea
articles.content:
KCTU Stages Sit-in Strike in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) staged a sit-in strike for winning victory in the general strikes across south Korea on August 16.
					 Representatives of industrial trade unions under the KCTU held a press conference on the sit-in strike in Youido, Seoul.
					
					 Speakers expressed astonishment at the deplorable fact that gangsters are cracking down on workers in broad daylight at tacit connivance of police and with its help.
					
					 The "presidential" candidates from the ruling party are trumpeting economic recovery, even though they are not aware of minimum wage, and the 19th-term "National Assembly" has never rewritten the wrong laws, they charged.
					
					 Intolerable is the deplorable fate of workers suffering from repression, they said.
					
					 They warned they will fight it out to end the unpopular society through large-scale struggle including general strikes in case their demands are not met.
					
					 That day all regional headquarters of the KCTU launched sit-in strikes in major cities, at city offices of all provinces, railway stations, etc., raising such major demands as abolition of part-time job and resolution and layoff, revision of the evil law on labor, reduction of labor hours and stop to privatization.

articles.title: Gas Explosion in S. Korea
articles.content:
Gas Explosion in S. Korea 
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- A gas explosion took place at a building in Samchok, Kangwon Province of south Korea, on Friday, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 The accident left dozens of people wounded and vehicles and scores of buildings around it seriously damaged. 
					
					 It was reported that a block of apartment 200-odd meter away from the spot also suffered heavy damage.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Foreign Papers
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The full text or gist of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous Country" was carried by foreign papers from Aug. 7 to 10.
					 The work, published on July 26, 2012, clarifies the essence of     Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his life characterized by ardent love for the country and its people.
					
					 It also clarifies important issues arising in effecting Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					 The foreign papers include the Russian paper Dibi-Rekullama, Bangladeshi papers Daily Fork and Blits, Nepali papers Arpan and Review Nepal and the paper of Democratic Congo La Prosperite.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Holidays Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Holidays Marked Abroad 
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- There took place in Poland and Switzerland on Aug. 10 and 11 celebrations of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership of and the 67th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Displayed in the venues of the events were photos showing revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were works of the peerlessly great men and books introducing their revolutionary feats.
					
					 Korean films dealing with feats of Kim Jong Il were shown at the events.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Slaboy January Guzowski, chairman of the Central Committee of the Poland-Korea Association, said that the foundation of the Songun idea was already laid when the President started the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					
					 He continued: 
					
					 Kim Jong Il started his Songun leadership by inheriting the idea of the President.
					
					 It is extremely natural for the people of the DPRK, who are holding in high esteem Kim Jong Un who has inherited the Songun politics, to mark the anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun leadership.  The anniversary is a significant day to other world peoples as well who desire the genuine freedom, democracy and rosy future.
					
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee and chairman of the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, noted that Kim Jong Un gave field guidance to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on the New Year 2012 to demonstrate his will to creditably carry forward the Songun revolutionary leadership of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il generation after generation.
					
					 He noted that the people of the DPRK are sure to win in the drive to build a thriving nation and achieve national reunification under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Messages of greeting to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Patriotism Lauded by Russian
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Patriotism Lauded by Russian 
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Dmitri Kostenko, chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, released a statement on August 12 as regards the publication of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous Country".
					 His work developed in depth the Juche-based theory of building a state, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his work expounded in detail the noble traits of leader Kim Jong Il who ardently loved his country and people.
					
					 Patriotism enshrined by Kim Jong Il with ardent and genuine love for the country serves as a great driving force for the people of the DPRK who turned out in the drive for building a thriving nation.
					
					 His work is being brilliantly recorded in the history of carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 If one wants to be a genuine patriot, one should follow the great example set by Kim Jong Il who devoted his all to the country and people till the last moments of his life.
					
					 The work is being lauded worldwide for its historic significance in adding shine to Kim Jong Il's idea of patriotism and feats.

articles.title: Chilean Party Slashes at U.S. Attempted Terrorism against DPRK
articles.content:
Chilean Party Slashes at U.S. Attempted Terrorism against DPRK 
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of Chile (Proletarian Action) made public a statement on August 5 in denunciation of the U.S. which spearheaded the attempted hideous state-sponsored and politically-motivated terrorism against the DPRK.
					 The statement said that U.S. moves against the DPRK reached a new serious phase.
					
					 The U.S. is gathering mercenaries and terrorists for the purpose of destroying statues, symbol of the dignity of the supreme leadership of socialist Korea, and grand monuments, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. is the prime-mover of hideous state-sponsored and politically-motivated terrorism against the DPRK.
					
					 It has massively financed the organizations breeding plots against the DPRK every year, escalating psychological warfare and operation for destabilizing the DPRK.
					
					 This hideous terrorism aimed to stifle the socialist system in the DPRK is a clear manifestation of the U.S. hostile policy toward it.
					
					 The move to blow up the statues, in particular, is the most undisguised insult to the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and the mainstay of its people and a physical attack on them, a war action little different from invasion.
					
					 It is quite just for the DPRK to bolster its nuclear deterrent for the security of the country and nation under the situation in which the U.S. continues hostile actions despite its claim that it does not intend to be hostile toward the DPRK.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked by Paper of Koreans in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
Japan's Misconduct over Tok Islets Issue under Fire
						
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- Following the south Korean chief executive's tour of Tok Islets, the Japanese reactionaries have busied themselves, raising a series of "hardline cards" such as suspension of government-level exchange, recall of the Japanese ambassador from Seoul, visit to Yasukuni Shrine and stop to cooperation with south Korea over the DPRK issue. They are even talking about bringing a lawsuit against south Korea to the International Court of Justice.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a bylined commentary says in this regard:
					
					 It is the crafty attempt of the Japanese reactionaries to highlight the issue of Tok Islets this time in a bid to make it one of international disputes and take practical steps needed for grabbing the islets.
					
					 Japan's ever-more stepped-up moves with an eye on the islets are just the version of the Japanese imperialists' moves for aggression of Korea in the past and their extension.
					
					 What Japan seeks is to stage a comeback to Korea with the issue of the islets as a momentum.
					
					 Japan now has gone so shameless as to move to realize its old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere". The south Korean conservative authorities are to blame for this. The Lee Myung Bak regime has resorted to such submissive diplomacy as reading the face of Japan, the sworn enemy of the Korean nation, kissing with it, being engrossed in the moves to stifle fellow countrymen in the north. The regime has resorted to "quiet diplomacy" in dealing with Japan while calling for "the era of new cooperation, not questioning the past". As a result, Japan has become all the more arrogant. The south Korean chief executive went to Tok Islets, the inviolable part of territory of the Korean nation. But he was snubbed by his masters just like a criminal who trespassed on the land of other country without its permission.
					
					 The south Korean ruling forces described his tour as a "reflection of the strong will to defend the islets" but this will give little help to changing the situation.
					
					 The Korean nation will never tolerate the Japanese reactionaries as they have been intent on the moves to grab the islets, far from making apology and reparation for the past crimes. The same warning goes to the quislings who are selling the interests of the nation while fawning on the Japanese reactionaries.
